steps.title: Draw a pentagon or a shape with 5 sides.
steps.content: Draw a pentagon or a shape with 5 sides. This is the guideline for the body.

steps.title: Add 2 circles beneath the pentagon.
steps.content: Add 2 circles beneath the pentagon. This will serve as the guide for the wheels.

steps.title: Using the guideline, sketch out the body of the motorcycle (depending on what design you want) by dividing the shape into the front, the seat, the rear, etc.
steps.content: Using the guideline, sketch out the body of the motorcycle (depending on what design you want) by dividing the shape into the front, the seat, the rear, etc.

steps.title: Draw 3 smaller circles inside the wheels and don’t forget to add 2 lines to the front wheel and connect them to the body.
steps.content: Draw 3 smaller circles inside the wheels and don’t forget to add 2 lines to the front wheel and connect them to the body.

steps.title: Ink out the drawing and add in the details like the headlights, backlights, etc.
steps.content: Ink out the drawing and add in the details like the headlights, backlights, etc.

steps.title: Color the inked drawing.
steps.content: Color the inked drawing.

steps.title: Draw a triangle.
steps.content: Draw a triangle.

steps.title: Add 2 ovals for the front wheel and 2 more for the back wheel.
steps.content: Add 2 ovals for the front wheel and 2 more for the back wheel.

steps.title: Draw a rectangle from the middle of the front wheel to the top of the triangle.
steps.content: Draw a rectangle from the middle of the front wheel to the top of the triangle. And then add 2 reverse “L” shapes for the handles.

steps.title: Add 2 boxes for the body.
steps.content: Add 2 boxes for the body.

steps.title: Using the guidelines and shapes, sketch out the body of the motorcycle (depending on what design you want).
steps.content: Using the guidelines and shapes, sketch out the body of the motorcycle (depending on what design you want).

steps.title: Ink out the sketch and don’t forget to add the details.
steps.content: Ink out the sketch and don’t forget to add the details.

steps.title: Color the inked drawing.
steps.content: Color the inked drawing.

steps.title: Draw a diamond like hexagon for the body.
steps.content: Draw a diamond like hexagon for the body.

steps.title: Draw an irregular trapezoid in the left part for the bike front and a spike shape at the right for the back of the bike.
steps.content: Draw an irregular trapezoid in the left part for the bike front and a spike shape at the right for the back of the bike.

steps.title: Draw an arch for the wheel guard.
steps.content: Draw an arch for the wheel guard.

steps.title: Draw an irregular pentagon with two circles for the bike engine.
steps.content: Draw an irregular pentagon with two circles for the bike engine.

steps.title: Draw in the handlebars.
steps.content: Draw in the handlebars.

steps.title: Draw another set of rectangles for the wheel connector.
steps.content: Draw another set of rectangles for the wheel connector.

steps.title: Draw two circles each with small circles inside for the wheels.
steps.content: Draw two circles each with small circles inside for the wheels.

steps.title: Draw a set of attached rectangles to make the muffler.
steps.content: Draw a set of attached rectangles to make the muffler.

steps.title: Based on the outline, draw the main sections of the bike.
steps.content: Based on the outline, draw the main sections of the bike.

steps.title: Add details to your bike.
steps.content: Add details to your bike.

steps.title: Erase the unnecessary outlines.
steps.content: Erase the unnecessary outlines.

steps.title: Design your dirt bike!
steps.content: Design your dirt bike!

steps.title: Draw an irregular rectangle.
steps.content: Draw an irregular rectangle.

steps.title: Draw a triangle connected to the rectangle earlier to make the back part of the scooter.
steps.content: Draw a triangle connected to the rectangle earlier to make the back part of the scooter.

steps.title: Draw a big trapezoid with a small inverted trapezoid above it to make the front part of the scooter.
steps.content: Draw a big trapezoid with a small inverted trapezoid above it to make the front part of the scooter.

steps.title: Draw three circles, two for the wheels and a one smaller one for the headlight.
steps.content: Draw three circles, two for the wheels and a one smaller one for the headlight.

steps.title: Draw three ovals for the wheel guard and driver seat.
steps.content: Draw three ovals for the wheel guard and driver seat.

steps.title: Draw the handle by adding a series of rectangle; Draw circles connected to the handles for the side mirror.
steps.content: Draw the handle by adding a series of rectangle; Draw circles connected to the handles for the side mirror.

steps.title: Draw the muffler by making rectangles.
steps.content: Draw the muffler by making rectangles.

steps.title: Based from the guidelines, complete your scooter.
steps.content: Based from the guidelines, complete your scooter.

steps.title: Erase any unnecessary guidelines.
steps.content: Erase any unnecessary guidelines.

steps.title: Color your scooter!
steps.content: Color your scooter!
